reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and perfect for spring, appreciating how it accentuates the waist in a flattering way and shapes the body nicely. The fit and material quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits well and the fabric is nice, others report it's tight around the chest and the material feels cheap for the price. The zipper quality is problematic, with customers reporting it's hard to use and gives up, while opinions on value for money are divided between those who find it worth the price and those who say it's not worth the cost. The see-through aspect also gets mixed reviews, with some saying nothing is see-through while others note the bottom half is transparent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, looks like photos!
items.body: I was very pleasantly surprised by this one. Many clothing buys on Amazon are a hit and miss. This was a hit, I am in love, buying in black and navy as well. Great price for the quality. Gorgeous, flattering, sexy and classy at the same time, ultra feminine compliment -getter. The slit is not too high and doesn‚Äôt show your legs when standing or walking, but you can definitely show off your legs in it if you want ;). Surprisingly comfortable. Nice fabric, well constructed and well sewn. Super adjustable- long ties to allow sizing variability. Will flatter small bust and contain larger bust. Great wide shoulder straps. Bought it for trip to Dubai in 90 degree weather and it was not hot, it felt cooling. Fabric feels great on. My guy went CRAZY when he saw me in it. Immediately wanted to get under it - but not to take it off lol. Romantic classic look. Bought it in red and called her Carmen. Looked great with a little shrug on. Dress is lined and very light weight, silky good quality and good strength fabric (you can really tighten the waist and it will hold you in! Nicely). This dress doesn‚Äôt travel well- wrinkles easily but totally worth the time to steam or iron. I am 5‚Äô3‚Äù, 34C bought the smallest size. I never want to get out of it whenever I put it on. Brings out your inner princess. Read more
items.author: Mia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, flattering, and worth every penny
items.body: Fantastic value, beautiful quality, and a perfect fit. The color is vibrant, the material feels expensive, and the cut is both sexy and classy. It moves beautifully and looks far more high-end than the price suggests. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this dress. Read more
items.author: L M M

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and affordable dress
items.body: Keep in mind I‚Äôm hunched over and unfortunately have no other photos in the dress, but I think the dress was cute. Not see through and double lined. The straps are adjustable but have big silver clasp. There‚Äôs a slit and tie in the front and corset type tie in the back. The straps in the back are very long and I cut them shorter so they didn‚Äôt hand down to my butt all day. Read more
items.author: Lauryn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A rotund yes!
items.body: I bought this in the colors red and brown and they‚Äôre total showstoppers! The fabric is definitely nice and thick. I noticed a lot of reviews saying the dress was see-through but that‚Äôs definitely not the case with the ones I received. I‚Äôm in between sizes (6-8) so I went with a size 8-10. It might be just a tad loose in the corset back but it fits perfectly everywhere else. I wouldn‚Äôt say the fabric is stretchy, per se, but the corset lace definitely adds a lot of wiggle room to slip into it. It is beautiful and flowy and definitely makes a statement! Read more
items.author: z

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material: high end & VERY versatile:Parties,Wine Trips,Weddings/Cocktail,Casual or Dressy night out
items.body: I never leave reviews, but this dress is worth it! I am NOT exaggerating when I say I have this dress in almost every color and it's so versatile. Initially stole the white dress from my sister (shhh...IYKYK) and was immediately obsessed. Quality: 10/10 | Color: White, Pink, and Navy (want/need Red) | Flow: The slit is sexy, not obvious | Size: 10 (for more fitted look) & one in 12/14 (pink) I have worn it to an all white party, pink dress for a Girls Wine Trip, and the navy dress to a Wedding cocktail party/rehearsal dinner. Dress it up or down: wear it with flats, boots, wedges, or heels. TIP: Wear a strapless bra and tie the front as tight as possible so there leaves no gap in the front. The strings in the front are very long. I asked a friend to channel Rose's mom from Titanic and tie the corset for me in the back. Don't break your ribs for this dress, but you get the idea! :) EASY enough to tie yourself as well. Adjust the strings in the back to loosen before wearing. TIP 2.0: Buy the dress! Read more
items.author: Bianca

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like the dress but not the material :/
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I‚Äôm giving this dress 3 stars. While it fits great and it‚Äôs very pretty and girly - I'm 5'6" and 138 lbs, and the size 6 worked perfectly - and it's breathable for hot Texas summers, I don't think it's worth $50. The material is super cheap and thin, which is my main complaint. Despite this, the dress is versatile and I loved the black color. I received many compliments when wearing it. If the quality were better, I'd give it a higher rating. The black dress is not see through if you were wondering . Btw I thought it looked super cute when I tied the strings like a bathing suit to give it a different style . Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for Itty bittys.
items.body: I was so excited to receive this dress. My husband and I are celebrating our 1st wedding anniversary and having a picnic. Ive seen this dress all over the place and loved it. Was always leery of it because I have a very, very small chest 34AA and thought the top was going to hang or bunch up....I read the reviews, saw a few with similar sized chests that it looked great on. I received today and in anticipation opened it to try it on....chest is so big on me i bend over and can see right down the dress. Immediately disheartened. I tightened up the straps, put my pushup bra on to see if it made it any better and no not really better. I wish the tiebon the chest was drawstring type but its not its a fixed strap you cant tighten. While the dress is cute, and looks amazing on me from under my bust down, it was the chest size that did it all wrong for me....im unfortunately going to have to return it because i dont like how the chest fits. Read more
items.author: amanda patterson

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wide shoulder straps Solid Navy, Wide shoulder straps Solid Brown, Wide shoulder straps Blue, Wide shoulder straps Bluegrid, Wide shoulder straps Solid Blue, Wide shoulder straps Solid Lilac, Wide shoulder straps Solid Yellow, Wide shoulder straps Solid Red, Wide shoulder straps Solid Pink, Wide shoulder straps Bluef, Wide shoulder straps Solid Black, Wide shoulder straps Yellowf, Wide shoulder straps Solid Sage, Wide shoulder straps Blackfloral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
